name: PushDown
description:
A multiplayer versus project inspired by Super Smash Bros. Hit your enemies head until they're too damaged to come back up

----------------------

This is a project I worked on for a while. It has a couple of bugs and the sounds generated with BFRX might cause slight headaches, sorry. But you can mute them in the menu by pressing "M".

----------------------

Controls:
-----
Selection Screen:
Press T to toggle the second player.
M to mute/unmute the sounds.
Player 1 selects with WASD and confirms with SPACE.
Player 2 selects with ARROW KEYS and confirms with ENTER.
-----
Game:
Player 1:
W to JUMP, S to ATTACK and SPACE to use SPECIAL
Player 2:
UP ARROW to JUMP, DOWN ARROW to ATTACK and ENTER to use SPECIAL.

-----
I might update this game and I might not. It all comes down to how much spare time I have which it isn't much lately.
[ps: sorry for any grammar mistake or something like that]
